short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Soccer Legends Original as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.es: ¡Juega Soccer Legends Original como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi jalgpalli legendid originaalina Chrome'i laiendusena - saad mängida ka internetiühenduseta, proovi kohe järgi!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Soccer Legends Original bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari ring Maglaro nang walang Internet, subukan mo na ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Soccer Legends Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez aussi jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.he: שחקו באגדות כדורגל המקורי כהרחבת Chrome - ניתן גם לשחק בלי חיבור לאינטרנט, נסו עכשיו!
short.hi: Juega a Soccer Legends Original como una extensión de Chrome - ¡También puedes jugar sin conexión a internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.hu: Játssz a Soccer Legends Original játékkal Chrome bővítményként - Az internet nélkül is játszhatsz vele, próbáld ki most!
short.id: Juega a Soccer Legends Original como una extensión de Chrome - ¡También puedes jugar sin Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.it: Gioca a Soccer Legends Original come un'estensione di Chrome. Puoi anche giocare senza Internet, provaci ora!
short.ja: クローム拡張機能としてSoccer Legends Originalをプレイできます - インターネットなしでもプレイできます、ぜひお試しください！
short.lv: Spēlējiet "Soccer Legends Original" kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Varat spēlēt arī bez interneta, izmēģiniet tagad!
short.ms: Jouez à Soccer Legends Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez aussi jouer sans Internet, essayez maintenant !
short.nl: Speel Soccer Legends Original als een Chrome-extensie - Ook te spelen zonder internet, probeer het nu!
short.no: Juega Soccer Legends Original como una extensión de Chrome - ¡También se puede jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.ru: Играйте в Soccer Legends Original как расширение для Chrome - также можно играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sk: Hrajte Soccer Legends Original ako rozšírenie Chrome - Môžete si ju tiež zahrať bez pripojenia na internet, vyskúšajte teraz!
short.sl: Zaigrajte Soccer Legends Original kao Chrome proširenje - Također možete igrati bez interneta, isprobajte odmah!
short.sr: Играјte Soccer Legends Original kao Chrome proširenje - Takođe možete igrati i bez interneta, isprobajte sada!
short.sv: Spela Soccer Legends Original som en Chrome-tillägg - Kan också spelas utan internet, prova nu!
short.th: เล่นเกม Soccer Legends Original ในรูปแบบส่วนขยาย Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ตด้วย ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Chrome uzantısı olarak Soccer Legends Original oyna - İnternetsiz de oynayabilirsiniz, şimdi deneyin!
short.uk: Play Soccer Legends Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.vi: Chơi Soccer Legends Original như một tiện ích mở rộng trên Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为Chrome扩展程序播放足球传奇原版 - 也可以在没有互联网的情况下进行游戏，现在就试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 在Chrome擴充功能中玩《足球傳奇原創版》-也可以在沒有網路的情況下玩，現在就試試看吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Soccer Legends is an exhilarating and fast-paced online soccer game that captures the essence of the beautiful game. ⚽ This game allows players to take control of their favorite soccer teams and engage in intense, action-packed matches. Featuring a mix of strategy, skill, and a bit of luck, Soccer Legends 2021 offers a dynamic and engaging experience for soccer enthusiasts and gamers alike. 🎮

How to Play:
The game is played in a simplified soccer format. Each match consists of two teams, and the objective is to score more goals than the opponent within the given time limit. Players can choose from various teams, each with unique abilities and play styles. The game can be played in single-player mode against AI or in multiplayer mode, offering competitive gameplay with friends or online opponents. ⚔️💻

Are you ready to kick off the ultimate soccer experience? Lace up your virtual boots and dive into the excitement of Soccer Legends 2021! 🏆👟

# Play other games on the top-left menu.
